listing.listing_description: Casa Tepui is an enchanting private home at Tulum, situated within a gated community just one kilometer from Aldea Zama. With the ambiance of a jungle sanctuary, the villa blends contemporary architectural principles, high-end comforts, and the timeless, naturalistic minimalism of the Maya Riviera. Superb features include a private swimming pool, rooftop hot tub, gourmet kitchen, and four beautiful bedrooms with king or queen beds. The community also features a shared pool, clubhouse, paddle-tennis court, and 24-hour security, while various in-villa services are available.The villa's unique design by Tulum based Co-Lab Design delivers a graceful, seamless fusion of interior and outdoor living, with ample terraces and airy rooms that seem to hover amid the lush foliage. Savor a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and relax in hammocks strung within the wooden veranda. Kindle the barbecue grill in the afternoon, and relish a wonderful meal of local fruits, vegetables, and seafood. Sip juice or cocktails in the evening light, and crawl into the hot tub for a moonlit soak.Pocket doors open from the pool to the living room and kitchen, infusing the interior with an alfresco ambiance. The open-concept space includes a beautiful dining table, comfortable lounge, and fully equipped kitchen with generous prep areas and chef-quality appliances. Luminous white surfaces complement natural wood accents, harmonizing with the lush green surroundings. Air conditioning keeps you cool when necessary.There are two suites with king beds and ensuite bathrooms; one suite with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom; and a fourth room with a queen bed. All of the rooms include air conditioning, ceiling fans, and safes, and all enjoy dreamy jungle views. The arrangements are perfect for a family reunions, corporate retreat, or destination wedding guests.Casa Tepui is within walking distance of the shops and restaurants at Aldea Zama, and just over three kilometers from the main nightlife district of Tulum. Paradise Beach and the area's famous Mayan ruins are just over five kilometers away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Impeccable Brushstrokes is part of the magical Belizean Cove Estates, an exquisite beachfront oasis of tranquility with spectacular views of the Ambergris Caye and the remarkable Caribbean Sea.Brushstrokes villa is named to reflect the owners' love and appreciation for the art and people of Belize. Once inside this splendid villa you’ll be delighted by its light and airy cream décor that acts as the perfect backdrop to the many paintings and sculptures by local Belizean artists. Furnished tastefully with a mix of comfortable imported and locally designed furniture it also features fabulous Belizean Mahogany and other indigenous hardwoods that make you feel enveloped by local culture. Your immaculate kitchen is spacious and well equipped and has an adjoining dining area that easily accommodates up to eight people. Your relaxed living room features an entertainment system with a 42 inch high definition telephone and a surround sound system; all the comforts of home with the Caribbean just steps away.Outside your luxurious marble-decked veranda is the perfect place for you to savor a spectacular beachfront sunrise while you have breakfast of fresh local produce. Afterwards you might want to take a dip in the delightful shared pool or unwind in the hot tub. Why not head down to the beach later and take out a sea kayak? It’s going to be another superb day and this is the ideal way to explore the Caye.Your three bedroom villa features luxurious and uniquely decorated private guest bedrooms. The master bedroom, with king bed and lavish bathroom with shower and whirlpool tub, has another magnificent ocean view. The second bedroom, with queen bed, is decorated in whimsical island colors and a lovely third bedroom, with two twin beds, features a Mayan theme in its décor. Each bedroom has a door to the outside, copious windows and a full bathroom in luxurious Mexican Macedonia marble.San Pedro Town, the only town on the island, is just 3 miles away you are one mile from tennis and basketball courts. Belize’s famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25 mile length of the island._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With direct access to Tamarindo Beach and Langosta Beach just a one minute walk from home, you won’t have any trouble finding, traveling to, and enjoying Costa Rica’s gorgeous beach environment. With a spacious interior and a private, sandy beach-pad backyard, Villa Morabeza is ideal for a special event like a wedding, family reunion, or retreat. The villa’s eight en-suite bedrooms can easily accommodate up to twenty guests. And, Morabeza’s ocean view is the perfect background for an unforgettable vacation. Bring a camera.Morabeza’s open-air design invites the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely throughout all of its interior spaces, truly making the most of its beautiful climate. The living room is the perfect mixture of modern designer furniture and local beach flare. The kitchen is decked out in rich wood tones and high-end appliances. And, the dining area has an incredible wood table with seating for twenty.Outside, you’ll be able to enjoy every bit of the patio without the threat of mosquitoes and other annoying insects thanks to the villa’s MistAway all-natural pest control system. And, that’s important because the patio has an alfresco dining area, pool, beach pad, workout/yoga area, and several lounge spaces. Morabeza also comes with daily housekeeping, laundry service, a caretaker, and daily breakfast. And, with a private pathway to the beach, having fun in the sun couldn’t be easier.Tamarindo is vibrant beach town about five-minutes from Villa Morabeza’s private gated community. Sports fishing and surfing are both extremely popular with the locals, as are the beaches and beachfront bars and restaurants that line the coast. You’ll also find boutique shops and exciting nightlife in Tamarindo. If you’d like to learn a little about the local flora and fauna, head to Marino Las Baulas National Park for an authentic Costa Rican wildlife experience.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Catch the wind from your kite-board off Long Bay Beach, hunt for conch shells in the crystalline water, and stroll home barefoot to your private haven on Providenciales. Situated on the island's eastern shore, this contemporary cottage is just 500 paces from the beach and features panoramic ocean views from its upper balcony. Drive to Grace Bay in the villa's complimentary SUV or keep it simple with a poolside barbecue at sunset.The home is nestled on a gated property amid lush coastal flora, with a private swimming pool running 3 to 6 feet deep. Enjoy long hours sipping drinks under parasols, or curling up with a favorite book in the hammock or pod chair. Cook fresh fish on the grill in the evening light, and relish your meal alfresco on the balcony.The interior offers a cool sanctuary for afternoon downtime or festive nights. An open-concept layout includes a TV lounge, reading nook, 4-person dining table, and fully equipped kitchen. Air conditioning and contemporary conveniences including Wi-Fi and a washer/dryer create a comfortable home base between island adventures.The master suite opens to a private, ocean-view balcony and features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. The guest suite, essentially a second master, opens to a wrap-around balcony with hammock. There is also a double-size sofa bed in the living room—perfect for kids or an extra guest.Located on the windward shore of Providenciales, Long Bay Beach is famous worldwide for its kite-boarding conditions, while its generally shallow waters can be ideal for swimming. The famous sands and restaurants of Grace Bay are just 3 kilometers away, and you're about 4 kilometers from Provo Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Bright blue skies and lush green fairways are the backdrop to an elegant Caribbean holiday at Sienna. Set on the tenth hole of the Robert Trent Jones-designed Royal Westmoreland golf course, just minutes from the beach, this Barbados vacation rental is perfect for avid players and devoted sun-seekers alike. Invite up to six friends or family members to join you at this three-bedroom luxury property.Tropical gardens surround the villa's outdoor living areas, which feature a private pool, barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight, and both shaded and sunny sitting areas. A wine fridge keeps refreshments at the perfect temperature, while Wi-Fi lets you easily share snaps of your stay. Guests are also welcome at the Royal Westmoreland resort clubhouse, gym, tennis court, beach and more.Travertine marble floors and coral-stone walls are the polished backdrop to the home's refined rooms. Panoramic windows flood the open-concept living and dining areas with sunlight, and even the fully equipped kitchen is bright and breezy. A separate den is a more intimate place to escape with a book or watch a favorite movie.Sienna has two bedrooms with their own balconies overlooking the golf course and the Caribbean Sea in the distance: a master suite with a king bed and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The third bedroom has a twin bed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and, for your comfort, air conditioning.From the villa's golf-course setting, it's only a few minutes to the resort facilities on popular Mullins Beach, designer shops, polo and, of course, golf. A short drive will bring you to three other beaches, including picturesque Sandy Lane (the perfect setting for a honeymoon-style sunset stroll), and the shops and restaurants of downtown Bridgetown, the capital of Barbados.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The sun, sand and sea of the Riviera Maya are all at the doorstep of Hacienda Del Mar. Even better, this beachfront vacation rental has an attentive staff, luxury amenities and fifteen bedrooms for up to thirty-five guests, both in the main house and in two casitas. Reserve this beautifully appointed property for a family reunion, birthday or anniversary celebration, or a sun-kissed destination wedding for up to 250 guests along with the two additional sister haciendas.Your stay at the hacienda includes the services of a gourmet chef for three meals each day, villa manager and housekeeper, as well as welcome refreshments and bottled drinking water. (If you’ll be staying over the winter holidays, even more is included.) The villa features its own heated pool, an outdoor sound system, and al-fresco living and dining areas facing the beach, plus a games room, bar, satellite television and Wi-Fi.Sliding glass doors connect the villa’s open-concept great room to its beachfront outdoor living areas.There are seven bedrooms in the villa’s main house and four bedrooms in each of its two casitas. In the main house, there are five bedrooms with king beds and two with two twin beds each. Both casitas have two bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. All of the casita bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms.The oceanfront location of Hacienda Del Mar puts you right on Fatima Bay Beach, a 5-minute walk from the Puerto Aventuras Golf and Tennis Club, and a 10-minute drive from Xpu-Ha Beach and downtown Playa del Carmen. Be sure to leave time for a day trip to the ruins of Tulum, a 30-minute drive away, and Tulum itself, an increasingly popular honeymoon and getaway destination.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.Read our insider guide to Hacienda Del Mar in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/05/vacation-diary-riviera-maya-mexico/)

listing.listing_description: Casa Lieber is located in a privileged spot a few steps from the Sea of Cortez shore within the high-end section of Fundadores in the Puerto Los Cabos development. Surround by magnificent and lush gardens, you’ll tend to forget that you are surrounded by the desert. One of the most talented architects in the area designed this boutique villa, filling the residence with characteristic eclectic details and Spanish architectural elements.There is no doubt that this luxury residence is all about large open spaces. The main terrace, BBQ, deck and swimming pool are the special touches that will make your stay at Casa Lieber truly unforgettable. Enjoy all the amenities of home at Casa Lieber including television, DVD player, surround sound system, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and laundry facility. With an on-site security guard and daily housekeeping, your villa will be safe and immaculate every day of the week.Drink in style at the bar while enjoying your high tech media room, or relax in the generous family room by an arcade verandah transporting you all the way to Andalucía. Arched beams and colonial-style furniture decorate your abode, creating a space you can bask in. Gorgeous mahogany cabinets and marble countertops adorn the kitchen, leaving only room for excellence and culinary mastery.Two spacious master bedrooms and two guest suites are strategically situated for total independence in order to provide privacy to their occupants. With a total of four bedrooms, Casa Lieber can accommodate up to eight guests, and is perfect for families and diverse groups. Each bedroom includes a king or queen sized bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, satellite television and an ocean or garden view terrace.Cabo San Lucas is the leader in the retreat scene in Mexico. With an incredible array of first-class resorts, world-renowned fishing, a plethora of activities and a broad range of dining and entertainment venues, Can San Lucas has much to offer. The design and decor at Casa Lieber represents a marriage of classical Mexican-colonial design and sleek, modern amenities. Whether you have come for golf, water sports or a sultry nightlife, you will find it here. Come and frolic in the glorious Mexican sunshine and enjoy the vacation you deserve!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Bird of Paradise Villa is a true gem for the connoisseur. Named one of the “Top 20 Villas in the World” by Islands Magazine, this Anguillan oasis offers the exclusivity of a boutique hotel, the privacy of an enclave and the top tier services and amenities of a first class resort. Perched above a perfect crescent beach, Bird of Paradise looks across the Caribbean to the mountains of St. Barths and St. Martin.Bird of Paradise boasts not one, but three swimming pool areas, the most extensive bathing system of any villa on Anguilla. The lagoon-style pools are heated and range in depth from three to nine feet. The property manager works exclusively for the villa and will meet and greet you upon arrival at the airport or dock. Your reservation includes a twenty-four hour concierge, daily housekeeping and a grounds person to assist with beach chairs and other requests. With its executive chef, Kids’ Club and spa services, you may never want to leave the grounds of this exclusive paradise.Bird of Paradise includes seating for more than fifty guests in the living areas. Other features across the approximately 4000 square feet property include an interior living room with a wet bar, an exterior living room with a fireplace, a covered verandah with a day bed and lounge chairs. Enjoy the privilege of your sundeck as well as a ‘hilltop’ deck with chairs and an Indonesian-style gazebo. Technology at Bird of Paradise includes flat screen televisions, DVDs, a nine-speaker sound system and Wi-Fi.The four air conditioned bedroom suites each have private, exterior entrances and private verandahs with lounge chairs and views of the beach. Each suite is equipped with a credenza that holds a refrigerator and coffee/wine service for added comfort. You will find interior/exterior showers, whirlpool baths and walk-in closets. Luxury linens, and toileteries, beach bags and towels are complimentary.Whether for walking, swimming and snorkeling, Sandy Hill Bay is a delightful beach for your time on this wonderful island. In nearby Sandy Ground, “the entertainment capital of Anguilla,” you will discover a sleepy village by day that lights up at night with imaginative beach bars and hot night spots. Come discover a soothing island rhythm and warm hospitality at Bird of Paradise!Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/girls-getaway-weekend-ideas/)Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: In the 1950s, Jamaican attorney Clinton Hart happened onto this remarkable three-acre oceanfront location and built a simple beach cottage for his family. Since then, Canoe Cove has been a virtually unembellished and beloved family home for generations. Recently, Hart’s grandson replaced the worn cottage with new architecture and contemporary finishing. Straightforward, uncomplicated and loaded with thoughtful comforts, this Ocho Rios bijou redefines luxury in a beachy, barefoot lifestyle!You will hardly know where to begin your holiday. A splash in the Junior Olympic swimming pool or a soothing soak in the hot tub? Keep the good times rolling with some alfresco dining while the private chef makes the barbeque sizzle. Meanwhile, the consummate entertainers will surely find themselves mixing drinks at the outdoor wet bar. From an alfresco shower, to sun loungers, an oversized sandbox and a putting green, Canoe Cove has got you covered. Take the paddle boards and kayaks out to sea, have a rally at the tennis court or shoot some hoops – the options are virtually endless!This vacation rental is stylish without pretense or overstatement. Textures of exotic woods establish a grounded, organic ambience as a backdrop against stylish furnishings. Cedar, Jojoba, Honduran pine, marble, coral stone and natural cement floors are so cool under bare feet. Finishes of reclaimed teak and driftwood echo the landscape of the Caribbean. Decorating a hallway is a whimsical six foot pendant lamp made entirely of old magazines. Across the lawn, the supporting structures of the gazebo are purloined telephone poles with bamboo bases. Delicate orchids adorn most rooms and are cultivated on-site.Seven exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the suites offer king size beds, except for one with two doubles. Perks include rain showers and access to a terrace or balcony. Canoe Cove makes a great bet for a large family holiday or a special event such as a wedding.During your stay in this enchanting part of Jamaica, the nearby outdoor museum Columbus Park offers the opportunity to learn about the Spanish Colonial era through the artifacts on display. Perhaps you will take a boat trip or visit the friendly inhabitants of Dolphin Cove. However you choose to spend your time, you will cherish the familiar feelings of coming back to Canoe Cove!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Olympus is a luminous contemporary gem situated on a beachfront estate near Rum Point on the north shore Grand Cayman. Masterfully designed to optimize its seaside setting and panoramic ocean views, the 3,000-square-foot home features ample alfresco living areas including a pool deck and superb rooftop terrace, along with spacious, stylish interiors illuminated by expansive glass walls. Four ocean-view bedrooms accommodating twelve guests include a family suite and a stunning master suite with private terrace. Your vacation rental includes on-island benefits provided by Silver Thatch, including reservation services, a variety of discounts, and access to fitness and business centers.Pristine white sands extend from the villa's pool terrace to the verge of the crystalline Caribbean, inviting you to plunge into the dreamy water and survey the vast horizon. Tile patios and lounge chairs frame the wrap-around pool, while the ipe wood deck hosts a chic lounge for afternoon refreshments in the shade. The rooftop features the villa's pièce de résistance: a voluminous terrace with sheltered dining table, kitchen, open-air lounge, and 360-degree views of the island and sea.A 40-foot, floor-to-ceiling glass door opens from the pool deck to the villa's interior, imbibing the ocean's light and breeze. The ample salon includes a large flat-screen TV, while the open, chef-appointed kitchen boasts a marble-topped island beside a beautiful wood dining table. Pure white walls and sleek lines accentuate the island light and hues of sunset, while natural wood furnishing and accents infuse a rustic note into the ethereal ambiance. The media room is perfect for afternoon downtime or cozy nights, and there is a furnished home office for business travelers.The bedroom suites at Olympus offer exquisite private havens for couples, individuals, and families, featuring ensuite bathrooms, high-end entertainment systems, air conditioning, and breathtaking ocean views. The exceptional North King Suite opens to a well-appointed terrace and features a bold glass wall to maximize its privileged ocean vistas. The family suite includes a queen bed, sofa bed, and kitchenette.The prime location of Olympus balances seaside seclusion and convenient proximity to some of the finest clubs, beaches, and nightlife spots on Grand Cayman, with Rum Point Club, Kaibo Yacht Club, and Starfish Point all within five to ten minutes of your door._ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sway back and forth in a hammock as the sun sets at this beachfront villa in Costa Rica. Follow the lawn past the hay-thatched palapa onto your own slice of Santa Teresa Beach, where magnificent ocean views await. Or, hang back and splash around in the villa’s infinity pool. Later, walk 3-minutes into town for dinner and shopping, or drive 5-minutes to find vibrant nightlife.Casa Milya lets nature shine in its airy, open-concept interior. Showing off relaxing wood tones, pastels, and bright textiles, this beach house is the perfect complement to the gorgeous setting outside. Through ocean-framing doors, you’ll flow freely to the alfresco setting, where a rustic, yet trendy picnic table sets the perfect tone for backyard barbecues. Tall palm trees create shady spots for reading, while sunbeds are ready to help you work on your vacation tan in other areas of the terrace. Back inside, pull up a stool at the kitchen bar, mix a few tropical cocktails, and soak up the breezy vibes.Santa Teresa has excellent surfing conditions for all experience levels. If you’re a seasoned vet, Playa Santa Teresa is known for its fast, powerful breaks. If you’re a first-timer, take a lesson on Playa Hermosa, where you’ll find gentler, smaller waves to help ease you in. After, cool down with a cocktail at one of the beachfront bars on Santa Teresa’s coast.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Thoughtfully designed to protect its guest's privacy, this luxury villa enjoys instant beachfront access to Jamaica’s finest, James Bond Beach. Without interrupting the endless ocean view, Roaring Pavilion manages to use dense tropical greenery and a secured perimeter to create a secluded oasis for its ten guests. Inside, you’ll fall in love with Roaring Pavilion’s four themed master-bedrooms, and children’s bunk. The house features a full staff, spacious indoor/outdoor lounge areas, and an extensive list of amenities. Roaring Pavilion is the perfect setting for a special event and has hosted countless A-listers over its many years perched atop the list of Jamaica’s most sought-after luxury vacation rentals.The intricacy and grace of colonial architecture is the perfect contrast to Jamaica’s incredible natural environment. Wide archways to the terrace invite fresh ocean breeze, natural sunlight, and amazing views of the Caribbean Sea to exist ubiquitously throughout every inch of Roaring Pavilion’s elegant interior. Decorated with stately chandelier lighting, designer furniture, the highest-end electronics, and eclectic works of art, Roaring Pavilion is more than ready to host your next unforgettable Luxury Retreats vacation.Social spaces like the games room, exercise room, library, barbecue pit, swimming pool, and beachfront ensure that you and your guests will always have somewhere exciting to gather. For more intimate moments, the anti-aging spa, wellness center, and numerous smaller seating areas provide the seclusion you desire. Inside, Roaring Pavilion is equipped with state of the art electronics, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. Outside, you’ll love the ocean view from the alfresco dining area. On the beach, you’ll have access to kayaks, paddle boards, and one Wave-Runner per suite.If you decide to venture beyond Roaring Pavilion’s gates, you’ll find shopping and golf just a few minutes from home. If you feel like exploring some of Jamaica’s natural wonders, Green Grotto Caves, Dunn’s River Falls, and Dolphin Cove are perfect for an afternoon excursion, and they’re within twenty-minutes of home.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Roaring Pavilion boasts a full-time staff. At guests' beck and call, the staff provides every service imaginable, from individual culinary requests to the meticulous attentions of a butler, to complimentary, professionally managed laundry. Of particular note is chef Johanna Mitchell, whose culinary delights include intricate continental dishes and dazzling local specialties with the freshest market ingredients. Twenty-four hour room service is also available at this one of a kind retreat. All service is provided seamlessly and discreetly, with guests only charged for their actual consumption of food and beverages, and use of chauffeured ground service, at local prices. They are not bound to any set plan or menu, but can enjoy themselves as their preferences and lifestyle dictate.

listing.listing_description: Nestled in a grove of 40 lush coconut palms at the end of prestigious Turtle Tail Drive, fully staffed Tip Of The Tail Villa is the definition of contemporary Caribbean luxury living. This gated, private mini resort is a celebrity caliber villa where guests have exclusive access to nearly 500 feet of spectacular oceanfront on 1.1 acres.Masterfully designed for seamless indoor/outdoor living there is ample room and accommodates 12 comfortably. There are two identical king master suites and three guest suites, each with two queen beds, all bedrooms are outfitted with 1000 thread count Egyptian cotton sheets. Spa-like bathrooms are equipped with Ralph Lauren towels and Molton Brown toiletriesThe expansive outdoor living spaces deliver breathtaking views of the turquoise waters from every vantage point. Its nearly impossible to look away from the hypnotic beauty of the Caicos Banks. This is a privileged place where you can smell the salt air, hear the waves and feel the pulse of the sea. The senses come alive at Tip Of The Tail Villa.With a private chef, housekeeper/butler to pamper you; this is the ideal villa for families, groups of friends and destination wedding guests.Savor mornings with unobstructed views as the sun rises from the sea. Stretch out on the gigantic sunbed or one of the many loungers. Cool off in the glass walled pool with a refreshing island beverage. Exotic wood decks guide you across sugar white sand to the water’s edge. The dock is your access to the sea at a depth of approximately 7 feet. Meander through the coconut palms to the shallow lagoon. Sparkling like a gem, this is a playground and the gateway to the mangroves. Kayak, paddleboard or snorkel- the equipment is ready for you. Here, turtles, rays and colorful fish are your only neighbors. This is the tropical paradise you have been searching for.Relax under thatched palapas or a hammock while listening to your favourite music- There are SONOS speakers and wi-fi everywhere. Feeling a little competitive? Tip of the Tail Villa offers a beach volleyball court, a beach bocce ball court, as well as a 3-hole putting green.SPLASH is probably the island’s coolest private beach bar. This space can open to reveal incredible water views on three sides. Beer taps, billiards, TV, this is the ultimate chill spot. Watch the big game on the screen or as guests play volleyball on the 10,000 square foot beach.When night falls, head to the enchanting fire pit and gaze up at the stars and into the eyes of your special people as they tell stories of the day’s splendor. The fire pit is just one place where sparks can rekindle.Tip Of The Tail Villa is a gathering place where memories are made and shared.

listing.listing_description: Find plenty to celebrate at the beachfront Hacienda Magica. This expansive Riviera Maya vacation rental has a gorgeous location in the exclusive Puerto Aventuras community, an attentive staff and fourteen bedrooms. Reserve this luxury property to host a family reunion or milestone celebration, or along with nearby Hacienda Corazon and Hacienda Del Mar to hold a wedding for up to 250 guests—and the honeymoon afterDuring your holiday, a gourmet chef, manager, butler and housekeeper will see to your needs. The villa feels like your own resort on Fatima Bay, with a pool, outdoor lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and sound system, as well as a private tennis court. Inside, you’ll find a ping-pong table for the kids, and satellite television and Wi-Fi for the grown-ups.Taking its inspiration from traditional Mexican architecture, Hacienda Magica is laid out around a central courtyard and features details such as graceful arches, beamed ceilings and intricate tile. The main living and dining areas, just off the courtyard, are bright and comfortable, with vibrant walls and artwork.There are eight bedrooms in the villa’s main house: five with king beds and three with two twin beds each. The hacienda also has three wings, each of which has one bedroom with a king bed and one bedroom with two twin beds. All fourteen bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Provided kayaks and paddleboards make it easy to explore the waters of Fatima Bay just in front of the villa. If you’d like to see more of the area, it’s a 5-minute drive to the Puerto Aventuras Golf & Tennis Club and a 15-minute drive to both Xpu-Ha Beach and lively Playa del Carmen. Don’t miss a visit to the Tulum ruins, 30 minutes away by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description: Walk past a row of swaying palm trees to reach the front door of this cubic villa. Shades of blue move throughout, in the form of plump couches, accent rugs, and abstract artwork, like the gently rolling waves of the Atlantic Ocean. Walk mere minutes to reach snorkeling adventures (think: sea turtles, lobsters, a rainbow of tropical fish) in Smith’s Reef or guided boat tours in Turtle Cove Marina.Sliding glass doors open the full length of the living room, expanding out to the secluded stretch of Babalua Beach, where you can dive in and be apart of the vivid underwater life. Set into the sugar-white sand, the heated infinity pool imitates the colour of the ocean, melting into the far-reaching vista beyond. Soaking up rays is effortless on the outdoor loungers, perhaps with a martini in hand and music in the air. Seek solace from the sun under the open air pergola, allowing yourself the comfort of the shade while inhaling the intoxicating scent of the sea. Soft ivory sand and crystal clear waters at Grace Bay Beach are 10 minutes away by car. Tee off at Provo Golf Club, explore a string of sleepy cays at Leeward, or mingle with the locals at The Bight Park’s Fish Fry. Back at the Sandcastle, your crew can enjoy happy hour or a starlit, alfresco dinner on the terrace.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
